name: render_story_map_outline_drawio
instructions: Render story-graph.json to DrawIO format using the story_io CLI. Execute: python -m agile_bot.bots.story_bot.src.synchronizers.story_io.story_io_cli render-outline --story-graph {project_path}/docs/stories/story-graph.json --output {project_path}/docs/stories/story-map-outline.drawio
